name: No Ctrl
description:
This is our entry to the GMTK game jam.

One robot on a quest for control. Control over his "life". Control over his future, and Ctrl on his keyboard.

You play as a robot with limited control, but as you gain headway, you unlock new skills but be warned that more control won't necessarily make the game easier.

Sometimes the jump pad will break, to fix just restart the level.
